original: Bergh, Gunnar Elias Severin, advokat, Göteborg, f. 28/9/87 i Stenberga, Jönköp. 1. G. 16 m. Hedvig Yngve. Barn: Gunvor, Lillemor, Märta, Lars-Gunnar, civrimg. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 05, jur. kand. i Lund 08. Efter anst. å domarekansH o. skilda adv :kont. adv. i Gbg sed. 12 o. inneh. av Gunnar Berghs Adv:byrà där. Led. av Sv:es advrsamf. sed. 17.
translated: Bergh, Gunnar Elias Severin, lawyer, Gothenburg, b. 28/9/87 in Stenberga, Jönköping. Married once, to Hedvig Yngve in 1916. Children: Gunvor, Lillemor, Märta, Lars-Gunnar, who is a civil engineer. He graduated from high school in Växjö in 1905 and earned a law degree from Lund University in 1908. After working as a clerk at various courts and law firms, he became a lawyer in Gothenburg in 1912 and took over the law firm of Gunnar Bergh. He has been a member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1917.
